data.description:
Solve puzzles to find your way out of the room before it is too late - Something lurks deep in the shadows. Welcome to a place where everything you ever imagined can be true, even your worst nightmare.

“Who in the world am I? Ah, that's the great puzzle.” - Lewis Caroll

“Imagination is the only weapon in the war against reality.” 
― Lewis Carroll, Alice in Wonderland

The Rabbit Hole is an immersive, intense and mind-bending experience built for Gear VR, play wherever you go using only Gear VR Touchpad.

To get the uttermost experience use while standing up and using headphones.

❏ A dark environment built with Unreal 4
❏ Live an Escape the Room experience in Virtual Reality
❏ More than 5 puzzles challenges 
❏ Incredible virtual sound effects

changelog.change_log: -Fixed issues with inputs with GearVR Controller and touchpad

Changes:
-Completely new hardcore movement mode

Fixes:
-Valid teleport range too short when tiny
-Wrong tooltip on door when all key parts collected
-No tooltip on Music Box potion when Motion Controller connected
-Non-interactable Main Menu button when inspecting
-Possible NullPointer when teleporting

New
-Direct multiview

Changes
-Waypoint markers no longer Billboards
-Various small performance improvements
-Small package size reduction

Fixes
-Gray Inventory background
-Out of center teleport (6DOF only)
-Possible teleport to void
-Possible NullPointer on inventory inspection
-Possible New Game with wrong size
-Duplicate hand
-Fade sort priority

Changes:
-Hardcore mode disabled when Motion Controller connected

Fixes:
-Possible black screen on some devices

Changes:
-Small apk size reduction
-Flip puzzle inspect after complete is no longer a state

Fixes:
-Invisible items on inventory
-Missing flag pole material on ES2
-Duplicate flip puzzle mesh
-Flip puzzle icons
-Flip puzzle highlights

Fixes:
-Possible teleport to invalid location
-Issues with New Game when character size different than Normal
-Issue that prevented some items being picked up

Fixes:
-a few broken refs
-Hotfix: Having the GearVR controller connected breaks everything

-Players can now manually control brightness
-Several more bugfixes and small improvements

-Translations available
-Engine updated
-Several bugfixes

- Comfort Mode (teleport mechanics and no camera bound transitions)
- Hardcore Mode (free movement to walk around and dynamic camera for important transitions)
- New and improved HUB/Menu with better options, settings and interactions (as well as a new scenario for it)
- A better UI and feedbacks (such as highlights for interacting with game objects)
- More jump scares
- Tons of bug fixes
- Tons of optmization
